com.amplifyframework.api.aws.auth

Class AuthRuleRequestDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.api.aws.auth.AuthRuleRequestDecorator

  • public final class AuthRuleRequestDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
    Processor that can decorate an AppSync-compliant GraphQL request with additional variables that are required for owner-based or group-based authorization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuthRuleRequestDecorator(ApiAuthProviders authProvider)
      Constructs a new instance of GraphQL request's auth rule processor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Decorate given GraphQL request instance with additional variables for owner-based or group-based authorization.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthRuleRequestDecorator

        public AuthRuleRequestDecorator(ApiAuthProviders authProvider)
        Constructs a new instance of GraphQL request's auth rule processor.
        Parameters:
        authProvider - the auth providers to authorize requests

    • Method Detail

      • decorate

        public <R> GraphQLRequest<R> decorate(GraphQLRequest<R> request,
                                      AuthorizationType authType)
                               throws ApiException
        Decorate given GraphQL request instance with additional variables for owner-based or group-based authorization. This will only work if the request is compliant with the AppSync specifications.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The type of data contained in the GraphQLResponse expected from this request.
        Parameters:
        request - an instance of GraphQLRequest.
        authType - the mode of authorization being used to authorize the request
        Returns:
        the input request with additional variables that specify model's owner and/or groups
        Throws:
        ApiException - If an error is encountered while processing the auth rules associated with the request or if the authorization fails
